## Matrix.subVectorLength property

The sub vector length for this matrix. The full vector needs to be divided in to smaller "sub" vectors which are laied out to cover the matrix. Each subvector will have the same length which will be wither the width or height of the matrix, depending on the vector direction. (beta)

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
get subVectorLength(): number;

set subVectorLength(newV: number);
```
